alert.note: Alert for Eddy County Plains (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued January 10 at 1:55AM MST until January 12 at 7:00AM MST by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 9 AM CST /8 AM MST/ THURSDAY TO 8 AM CST /7 AM MST/ FRIDAY... * WHAT...West winds 35 to 45 mph with gusts up to 70 mph expected. * WHERE...In New Mexico, Eddy County Plains. In Texas, Van Horn and Highway 54 Corridor, Chinati Mountains, Marfa Plateau, Davis Mountains Foothills and Chisos Basin, and Eastern Culberson and Central Brewster Counties. * WHEN...From 9 AM CST /8 AM MST/ Thursday to 8 AM CST /7 AM MST/ Friday. * IMPACTS...Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Severe turbulence near the mountains will be hazardous for low flying light aircraft.
info.instruction: Take action to secure trash cans, lawn furniture and other loose or lightweight outdoor objects. The high winds can topple trees, down power lines and damage some structures. Use caution if you must drive.
